        Parameters:
        hostUrl - String. The URL to get the response from.
        Returns:
        Integer. The status for the requested host.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the requested URL can not be reached or if any other error occurs during the request.

      • getHostStatus

        public java.lang.String getHostStatus(@NotNull
                                      @NotNull java.lang.String hostUrlAsString)
        Acquire the status of the specified host.
        Parameters:
        hostUrlAsString - String. The URL to get the status from.
        Returns:
        String. The status of the host. Can be either OK, CRITICAL, CONNECTION REFUSED, SSL HANDSHAKE ERROR, or PROTOCOL ERROR.

      • ping

        public boolean ping(java.lang.String address,
                    java.lang.String ip,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ports)
        Check the status of a given host and IP-address.
        Parameters:
        address - String The address of the host.
        ip - String The IP-address of the host.
        ports - List Ports with which to check for host availability. Use null if you want to use the default list of ports.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if the host is reachable/available.

      • ping

        public boolean ping(java.lang.String ip,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ports)
        Check the status of a given IP-address.
        Parameters:
        ip - String The IP-address of the host.
        ports - List Integer List. List of ports with which to check for host availability.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if the host is reachable/available.

      • checkAvailability

        private boolean checkAvailability(java.lang.String address,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ports)
        Check the availability of a host with a socket connection and a list of ports.
        Parameters:
        address - String Address of the host. IP preferred.
        ports - List Integer list of ports to check with.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if the host is reachable/available.
